title: Five ways you can make a difference during Waste Reduction Week (City of Ottawa)
text: ( Source : City of Ottawa ) Ottawa - Waste Reduction Week , October 19 to 25, is an ideal time to take action to reduce waste in your home or workplace. The City wants to help you, with tips and programs to help divert waste - two of which are
